changes: Added 'Compact Mode' for GIF exports to compress files under 10MB.
GIF uploads are now supported alongside static images.
Export to animated GIF added, including a GIF speed control that affects both preview and export.
Added "Click to upload" hint to the image upload area for better user guidance.
Added Demotivational mode: create classic poster memes with black borders, white frame, and customizable title/subtitle.
Advanced settings now allow you to adjust title and subtitle size for Demotivational memes.
Word wrapping for long titles and subtitles in Demotivational mode.
Seamless mode switching between Standard and Demotivational formats.
UI automatically adapts advanced controls for each meme type.
All features work on mobile and desktop, with high-DPI support.
Advanced settings have changed from input fields into - and + layout. Custom value typing still supported.
Added High-DPI support for crisp text on mobile screens.
Fixed keyboard overlapping issues on mobile devices.
